creator: rollantz@rollantz.nl
text:
Hello, I like to track the results of the tests when it is running (I know I'm
sad). 

Currently, the results are added to the end of the list. 

This means I have to keep scrolling when the list has reached the end. And I do
this (This confirms I am really sad).

Can JMeter be made configurable to add them to the begin of the list or to the
end of the list depending on the preference of the user?

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: Which list are you referring to?

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: No further information provided, so cannot proceed.
